exceptions.exn: The LHS of rev_cons (rev (_ :: _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of rev_cat (rev (_ ++ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H1 : forall (T : Type) (s t : seq T), rev (s ++ t) = rev t ++ rev s H0 : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), rev (x :: s) = rcons (rev s) x T : Type s : seq T Unable to unify "rev (belast s)" with "behead (rev s)".

original: rewrite rev_cons. simpl. rewrite rev_cat. simpl. reflexivity.
